name: One Shot (itch) (Revolution Game)
description:
Created for One Hour Game Jam

The theme for this game jam is Only One Bullet, so obviously the player only has 1 bullet. In One Shot, all enemies' location will be revealed at the beginning for 3 Seconds. You either decide your bullet path now or memorize the locations and shoot after careful planning.

Check this out maybe
